title: Was the Chevrolet small block engine the best ever made? - Quora

response.answer_text: At least one of them is still around. The 4.8L V8 is the old small block V8 updated with fuel injection and better plugs and ignition. Lots of power and much better fuel economy than a 5.7L with much better performance than the 4.3 V6. I have the 4.8 in my GMC Sierra, and have found it both economical (given it IS a full size truck) an with plenty of power. I like it.
